summary: Feature request to add query support when listing schedules in the TypeScript SDK, similar to the existing ListOptions functionality for workflows.
userImpact: Users cannot filter schedules by query parameters when listing, requiring them to retrieve all schedules and filter client-side.
proposedFix: Implement query parameter support in ListSchedules similar to ListWorkflows, with pageSize for pagination and query matching for filtering.
resolutionDetails: Implemented via PR #1535, adding query support to schedule listing operations.
keyQuote: Need to support the query option when listing schedules same as we do when listing workflows.
